title: What I want to know:
body:
There's huge discussions atm regarding the Singed support player.

before reading the rest of this post, I want people to remember that Brand support was originally an off meta thing, and I'm sure lots of people were reported for playing Brand in the bot lane before he _unfortunately_ became a "meta" support.
And on paper, Singed technically has more support capabilities than Brand (Tank, Knockup, Snare, Slow.)
_______
**So what I want to know is:**

If Singed support takes off, _(and because of the publicity, we can expect there to be a few)_ and like Brand, actually becomes a meta support.

Will RIOT un-ban this Singed player? and apologise to him?
Will he be compensated?

Just interested.

replies.body: some dont even get that first item, they just dont cs

The difference is, this guy doesn't play support, he plays singed roamer, he takes flash smite and counter jungles the enemy leaving his adc alone 1v2, he doesn't buy any support items and never goes to lane.
Well several rioters have already said the problem isn't him playing support singed. It's how he's playing as a support. So I don't think singed support becoming meta will change anything

Nothing will happen.

I don't understand how people are getting punished for this. Most 'supports' don't actually play as a support.

9/10 I don't see supports buy a sightstone unless they play thresh/leona.

i prefer the full built support items instead of eye items, to protect, slow, or run fast, its all helpful in stopping a gank, the only thing it doesnt stop, is hard cc, so thats the only time i die by a gank, or im way over extended
